titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of the 26th edition of the pocket version of the Constitution of the United States.
A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of the 26th edition of the pocket version of the Constitution of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: Authorizes the printing as a Senate document of the 26th edition of the pocket version of the U.S. Constitution.
